text: Moloch Carlo , caro mio .
Translation Carlo , my dear one .
Moloch Mi ami ? Ti darò tutto . Tutto quello che desidero è il tuo amore .
Translation Do you love me ? I can give you everything . All I want is your love .
carlos Tu hai il mio amore .
Translation You have my love .
thelonius E fuori . E il diavolo , Molocco . E fuori nel mondo , facendo tante cose male . Abbiamo bisogno di fare il circolo .
Translation He 's out . It is the devil , Moloch . He is out in the world , doing such bad things . We need to form the circle .
( Transcriber's_note in this part there is a significant difference between the subtitles from the episode and what was actually said , so the subtitles are included below . ) .
Subtitles It is Moloch . The Corrupter . He walks again . More and more people have fallen under his mesmerizing power . There is still time to bind him . We must form the circle .
thelonius Per potere di questo circolo di Kayless ... .
Translation By the power of the circle of Kayless ... .
Moloch No !
thelonius Per potere di questo circolo di Kayless , ti commando ! Vieni !
Translation By the power of the circle of Kayless , I command you ! Come !
thelonius Ti commando ! Vieni !
Translation I command you ! Come !
thelonius VIENI !
Translation COME !
thelonius Vieni , demonio ! Vieni !
Translation Come , demon ! Come !
thelonius Preghiamo che questo libro è mai letto più ... .
Translation Pray that this accursed book is never again read ... .
thelonius Che il demonio Molocco è mai lasciato più fuori nel mondo .
Translation Lest the Demon Moloch be loosed upon the world .
buffy_summers Oh , great ! A book !
rupert_giles Oh , uh , I , uh ... have n't gone through the new arrivals . Uh , put it in , uh , in , in that pile .
dave Here , I 'll get it .
buffy_summers Oh , thanks , Dave . The Willow pile .
rupert_giles Uh , when I 've examined it , you can , uh , uh , skim it .
jenny_calendar Scan it , Rupert . That 's scan it .
rupert_giles Of course .
jenny_calendar Oh , I know , our ways are strange to you , but soon you will join us in the 20th century . With three whole years to spare !
rupert_giles Ms. Calendar , I 'm sure your computer science class is fascinating , but I happen to believe that one can survive in modern society without being a slave to the , um , idiot box .
jenny_calendar That 's TV . The idiot box is TV . This is the * good * box !
rupert_giles I still prefer a good book .
fritz The printed page is obsolete . Information is n't bound up anymore . It 's an entity . The only reality is virtual . If you 're not jacked in , you 're not alive .

jenny_calendar Thank you , Fritz , for making us all sound like crazy people . Fritz , Fritz comes on a little strong , but he does have a point . You know , for the last two years more e - mail was sent than regular mail .
rupert_giles Oh ... .
jenny_calendar More digitized information went across phone lines than conversation .
rupert_giles That is a fact that I regard with genuine horror .
jenny_calendar I 'll bet it is . Alright , guys , let 's wrap it up for today .
willow_rosenberg I 've just got a few more . I 'll hang for a bit .
jenny_calendar Cool ! Thanks .
willow_rosenberg Xander , you wanna stay and help me ?
xander_harris Are you kidding ?
willow_rosenberg Yes , it was a joke I made up .
xander_harris Willow , I love you , but bye !
willow_rosenberg See you tomorrow !
xander_harris Buffy , wait up !
rupert_giles I 'm , I 'm just gon na stay and clean up a little . I 'll , uh , I 'll be back in the middle ages .
jenny_calendar Did you ever leave ?
Moloch Where am I ?
buffy_summers Willow ! Willow , hey , wait up !
willow_rosenberg Oh , Buffy , I did n't even see you .
buffy_summers Or hear me . What was up last night ? I tried your line , like , a million times .
willow_rosenberg Oh , I was , I was talking .
buffy_summers Talking to ... ? Okay , that 's it , you have a secret , and that 's not allowed .
willow_rosenberg Why not ?
buffy_summers 'Cause ... there 's a rule .
willow_rosenberg Well , I sort of met someone .
buffy_summers I knew it ! This is so important ! When did you meet ?
willow_rosenberg Last week after we did the scanning project in the library .
buffy_summers Does he go here ? What 's his name ? Have you kissed him ? What 's he like ?
willow_rosenberg No , Malcolm , no , and very nice .
buffy_summers You are a thing of evil for not telling me this right away !

willow_rosenberg Well , I was n't sure there was anything to tell . But last night , oh ! We talked all night , it was amazing . He 's so smart , Buffy , and , and he 's romantic , and we agree about everything !
buffy_summers What 's he look like ?
willow_rosenberg I do n't know !
dave Yes , I will . I promise .
buffy_summers So , you 've been seeing a guy , and you do n't know what he looks like ? Okay , this is a puzzle . No , wait , I 'm good at these . Does it involve a midget and a block of ice ?
willow_rosenberg I met him online .
buffy_summers On line for what ?
buffy_summers Oh !
jenny_calendar Morning , kids !
jenny_calendar Buffy , are you supposed to be somewhere ?
buffy_summers No , I have a free .
jenny_calendar Cool ! But this is lab time , so let 's make it a nice , short visit , okay ?
buffy_summers Sure .
PC You have mail .
willow_rosenberg It 's him !
Message I 'm thinking of you .
willow_rosenberg He 's so sweet !
buffy_summers He 's a sweetie .
willow_rosenberg What should I write back ?
buffy_summers Uh , Willow , I think it 's really great that you have this cool pen pal , but do n't you think you 're kinda rushing all into this ? Y'know what I mean ?
willow_rosenberg ' I 'm thinking of you , too ! ' No , that 's incredibly stupid !
buffy_summers Will , down girl ! Let 's focus here , okay ? What do you actually know about this guy ?
willow_rosenberg Oh , see , I knew you 'd react like this .
buffy_summers Like what ?
buffy_summers I just wanna make sure you 're careful , that 's all .
willow_rosenberg Buffy ... .
buffy_summers He could be different than you think .
Moloch Watch her .
willow_rosenberg His name is Malcolm Black , he 's eighteen , he lives in Elmwood , which is about eighty miles from here , and he likes me !
buffy_summers Short , tall , skinny , fat ?
willow_rosenberg Why does everything have to be about looks ?
buffy_summers Not everything , but some stuff is . I mean , what if you guys get really , really intense , and then you find out that he ... has ... a hairy back ?

willow_rosenberg Well , no ! Uh , he does n't talk like somebody who would have a hairy back . And anyways , that stuff does n't matter when you really care about each other . Maybe I 'm not his ideal either .
buffy_summers Hey , I 'm just trying to make sure that he 's good enough for you . I think it 's great that you met someone .
jenny_calendar Hey , Fritz ... I 'm , uh , lookin ' at the logs . You and Dave are clockin ' a pretty scary amount of computer time .
fritz New project .
jenny_calendar Ooo , will I be excited ?
fritz You 'll die .
boy This is n't my report ! ' Nazi Germany was a model of a well ordered society ' ? I did n't write that ! Who 's been in my files ?
xander_harris Hup , guess who ?
willow_rosenberg Uh , Xander ?
xander_harris Yeah , but keep guessing anyway .
willow_rosenberg Xander .
xander_harris Oh , I ca n't fool ya , you see right through my petty charade . We goin' to the Bronze tonight ?
willow_rosenberg Not me , I think I 'm gon na call it an early night .
xander_harris Oh , Malcolm , right ? Yeah , I heard . But you 're gon na be missin ' out . I 'm plannin ' to be witty . I 'm gon na make fun of all the people who wo n't talk to me .
willow_rosenberg That 's nice . Have a good time !
buffy_summers She certainly looks perky .

xander_harris Yeah , color in the cheeks , bounce in the step ... I do n't like it . It 's not healthy . So , are you goin' to the Bronze tonight ? Oh , probably not , you probably have some vampire slaying or some lame endeavor like that , do n't you ? Everyone deserts me .
buffy_summers Check out the jealous man !
xander_harris What are you talking about ?
buffy_summers You 're jealous .
xander_harris Of what ?
buffy_summers Willow 's got a thang , and Xander 's left hanging .
xander_harris Oh , that 's meaningless drivel . I 'm not interested in Willow like that .
buffy_summers Yeah , but you got used to being the Belle of the Ball .
xander_harris No , it 's just ... this Malcolm guy ? What 's his deal ? I mean , tell me you 're not slightly wigged .
buffy_summers Okay , slightly . I mean , just not knowing what he 's really like .
xander_harris Or who he really is . I mean , sure he says he 's a high school student , but I can say I 'm a high school student .
buffy_summers You are .
xander_harris Okay , but I can also say that I 'm an elderly Dutch woman . Get me ? I mean , who 's to say I 'm not if I 'm in the elderly Dutch chat room ?
buffy_summers I get your point ! I get your point . Oh , this guy could be anybody . He could be weird , or crazy , or old , or ... He could be a circus freak . He 's probably a circus freak !
xander_harris Yeah . I mean , we read about it all the time . Y'know , people meet on the ' Net , they talk , they get together , have dinner , a show , horrible ax murder .
buffy_summers Willow ax murdered by a circus freak ... Okay , okay , what do we do ? What are we doing ? Xander , you get me started ! We are totally overreacting !
xander_harris But it 's fun , is n't it ?
fritz I 'm jacked in . I 'm jacked in . I 'm jacked in .
fritz I 'm jacked in .
buffy_summers Whoa ! You 're the Late Girl .
willow_rosenberg I overslept .
buffy_summers Till fifth period ? Talkin ' to Malcolm last night ?
willow_rosenberg Yeah . What ?
buffy_summers Nothing .
willow_rosenberg You 're having an expression .
buffy_summers I 'm not . But if I was , it 'd be saying , ' This just is n't like you . '
willow_rosenberg Not like me to have a boyfriend ?
buffy_summers He 's boyfriendly ?
willow_rosenberg I do n't understand why you do n't want me to have this . I mean , boys do n't chase me around all the time . I thought you 'd be happy for me .
buffy_summers I just want you to be sure . To meet him face to face . In daylight , in a crowded place with some friends . Y'know , before you become all ... obsessive .
willow_rosenberg Malcolm and I really care about each other . Big deal if I blow off a couple classes .
buffy_summers I thought you said you overslept .
willow_rosenberg Malcolm said you would n't understand .
buffy_summers Malcolm was right .
buffy_summers Dave ? Hey there , Dave . Anybody home ?
dave Oh , what do you want ?
buffy_summers I wanted to ask you something if you have a minute .
dave What is it ?

buffy_summers Well , you 're a computer geek ... genius , and , uh , I sort of have a technical problem . If I wanted to find out something about someone , i - if someone e - mailed me , could I trace the letter ?
dave Well , you could pull up somebody 's profile based on their user name .
buffy_summers But they write the profile themselves , right ? And so they could say anything they wanted .
dave True .
buffy_summers Wow ! I had knowledge ! Well , is there a way to find out exactly where a letter , an e - letter came from ? I mean , the actual location of the computer ?
dave That 's a challenge .
buffy_summers 'Cause , you see , Willow 's got this boyfriend , Malcolm , and to tell you the truth , I think ... .
dave Leave Willow alone .
buffy_summers What do you mean ?
dave That 's none of your business .
buffy_summers Dave , are you Malcolm ?
dave Of course not .
buffy_summers Dave , what 's going on ?
dave Look , I 'll talk to you later , okay ? I 've got work to do .
buffy_summers So do I.
buffy_summers I 'm telling you , something is going on . It 's not just Willow . Dave , Fritz , they 're all wicked jumpy .
rupert_giles Those boys are n't sparklingly normal as it is .
buffy_summers Giles , trust me .

rupert_giles I - I do ! I - I - I really do n't know how to advise you . Things involved with a computer fill me with a childlike terror . Now , if it were a nice ogre or some such I 'd be more in my element . Well , I - I suppose you could , um , tail Dave , see if he 's up to something .
buffy_summers Follow Dave ? What , in dark glasses and a trench coat ? Please . I can work this out myself .
fritz She 's too close . What do I do ?
Moloch Kill her .
fritz Party .
buffy_summers Whatever Dave is into , it 's large .
rupert_giles What was the name of this place ?
buffy_summers It said CRD . But , I could n't get close enough to see what it was .
xander_harris Calax Research and Development . It 's a computer research lab . Third largest employer in Sunnydale till it closed down last year . What , I ca n't have information sometimes ?
rupert_giles Well , it - it 's just somewhat unprecedented .
xander_harris Well , my uncle used to work there . I - in a floor sweeping capacity .
buffy_summers But it closed ?
xander_harris Uh - huh .
buffy_summers Looked pretty functional from where I stood . I do n't have a clue what they were doing .
xander_harris And what do they need Dave for ?
buffy_summers Something about computers , right ? I mean , he is off - the - chart smart .
rupert_giles We still do n't know an enormous amount . Whatever is going on there may be on the up - and - up .
xander_harris No , if CRD opened , it would 've been on the news .
buffy_summers Besides , I can just tell something 's wrong . My spider sense is tingling .
rupert_giles Your ... spider sense ?
buffy_summers Pop culture reference . Sorry .
rupert_giles Yes , well , ahem , I think we 're still at a stand still . Uh , uh , short of breaking into the place , I do n't see ... .
buffy_summers Breaking in ! Then this is the plan !
xander_harris I 'm free tonight !
buffy_summers Tonight it is !
rupert_giles A moment , please , of quiet reflection . I do not suggest that you illegally enter the ... .
rupert_giles ... data into the file so the book will be listed by title as well as by author .
jenny_calendar I just came by to check your new data base , make sure your cross reference table is n't glitching . 'Cause I 'm guessing you have n't gone anywhere near it .
rupert_giles Uh , I 'm still sorting through the chaos you left behind you .
jenny_calendar Hmm . You 're here again ? Kids really dig the library , do n't cha ?
buffy_summers We 're literary !
xander_harris To read makes our speaking English good .
buffy_summers We 'll be going now .
rupert_giles Uh , w - we'll , uh , continue this conversation at another time .
buffy_summers I think we 're done . Makes our speaking English is good ?
xander_harris I panicked , okay ?
malcolm I 've never felt this way about anyone before , Willow .
willow_rosenberg I know what you mean . I feel like you know me better than anyone .
malcolm I do .
willow_rosenberg Do you think we should ... meet ?
malcolm I think we should soon .
willow_rosenberg I 'm nervous .
malcolm I 'm not . Is n't that strange ?
willow_rosenberg That 's what Buffy does n't understand , how comfortable you can make me feel .
malcolm Buffy just makes trouble . That 's why she got kicked out of her old school .
willow_rosenberg How did you know that ?
malcolm It 's on her permanent record .
malcolm You must have mentioned it .
willow_rosenberg I guess .
malcolm Let 's not worry about her anymore .
willow_rosenberg I have to sign off . I 'll talk to you later .
malcolm Do n't .
willow_rosenberg Bye .
jenny_calendar You 're a snob !
rupert_giles I am no such thing .
jenny_calendar Oh , you are a * big * snob . You , you think that knowledge should be kept in these carefully guarded repositories where only a handful of white guys can get at it .
rupert_giles Nonsense ! I simply do n't adhere to a , a knee - jerk assumption that because something is new , it 's better .
jenny_calendar This is n't a fad , Rupert ! We are creating a new society here .
rupert_giles A society in which human interaction is all but obsolete ? In which people can be completely manipulated by technology , well , well ... Thank you , I 'll pass .
jenny_calendar Well , ahem , I think you 'll be very happy here with your musty , old books .
rupert_giles These musty old books have a great deal more to say than in any of your ... fabulous web pages .
jenny_calendar Hmm . This one does n't have a whole lot more to say .
jenny_calendar What is it , like a diary ?
rupert_giles How odd . I have n't looked through all the volumes yet , I did n't , um ... .
jenny_calendar What is it ?
rupert_giles Uh , nothing , um , a , a diary , yes . I imagine that 's what it is . Well , it 's been so nice talking to you .
jenny_calendar We were fighting .
rupert_giles Must do it again sometime , yes ... Bye , now .
school_nurse I checked the computer , and there 's nothing in his file about being allergic to penicillin !
dave Buffy !
buffy_summers Dave ! How 're you doing ?
dave Okay . Uh , look , I 'm sorry about yesterday . I have n't been getting much sleep lately , y'know ?
buffy_summers Do n't sweat it .
dave Willow was looking for you .
buffy_summers Good , I need to talk to her . Do you know where she is ?
dave She said she 'd be in the , in the girls ' locker room .
buffy_summers Great . Thanks .
buffy_summers Will ?
buffy_summers Willow ?
buffy_summers Will ? You taking a shower ?
buffy_summers I guess not .
buffy_summers This is how droughts get started .
dave Buffy ! Get out !
dave I ca n't do it ! I 'm not gon na do it .
Moloch But you promised .
dave Buffy is n't a threat to you ! Stop with it .
Moloch The project is almost complete . You wo n't have to do it again .
dave Oh , I ca n't !
Moloch I 've shown you a new world , Dave . Knowledge , power ... I can give you everything . All I want is your love .
dave No . This is n't right . None of it is .
xander_harris I 'm gon na kill Dave !
buffy_summers He tried to warn me .
xander_harris Warn you that he set you up ? Is she gon na be okay ?
rupert_giles She was only grounded for a moment . Still , if you 'd been anyone but the Slayer ... .
buffy_summers Tell me the truth : how 's my hair ?
xander_harris It 's great ! It 's your best hair ever !
rupert_giles Uh , oh , yes .
buffy_summers I just ... I do n't understand what would make Dave do a thing like that .
rupert_giles I think perhaps I do .
rupert_giles Does this look familiar to either of you ?
buffy_summers Yeah , sure . Looks like a book .
xander_harris I knew that one .

rupert_giles In the dark ages the souls of demons were sometimes trapped in certain volumes . They remained locked within the book , harmless , unless the pages were read aloud . Unless I 'm mistaken , this is Moloch , the Corrupter . A very deadly and seductive demon . He draws people to him with promises of love , power , knowledge . Preys on impressionable minds .
xander_harris Like Dave 's .
rupert_giles Dave , and who knows how many others .
buffy_summers And Moloch is inside that book ?
rupert_giles Not anymore .
xander_harris You released Moloch ?
buffy_summers Way to go !
rupert_giles I did n't read it ! That dreadful Calendar woman found it and , and it was already blank .
buffy_summers Okay , so a powerful demon with horns is walking around Sunnydale , and nobody 's noticed ?
xander_harris I - if he 's so big and strong , why bother with Dave ? I mean , why did n't he just attack Buffy himself ?
rupert_giles I do n't know . And I do n't know who could 've read that book . It was n't even in English .
buffy_summers Where was it ?
rupert_giles Uh , in a pile with others that were , um , uh , scanned .
xander_harris And that released the demon ?
buffy_summers No , he 's not out here . He 's in there .
rupert_giles The scanner read the book . It brought Moloch out as information to be absorbed .
buffy_summers He 's gone binary on us .
xander_harris Okay , for those of us in our studio audience , who are me ? You guys are saying that Moloch is in this computer ?
buffy_summers And every computer connected to it by a modem .
rupert_giles He 's everywhere .
xander_harris What are we gon na do ?
rupert_giles Willow scanned him into her file . It may be ... a futile gesture , but I suggest we , um , uh , delete it .
buffy_summers Solid !
xander_harris Do n't get too close .
buffy_summers Okay . Okay . So which file do you think it is ? Willow ? That 's probably it , right ? I 'll just delete the whole thing .
Moloch Stay away from Willow ! It is none of your business !
buffy_summers So that 's what Malcolm looks like .
buffy_summers So much for delete file .
rupert_giles This is very bad .
xander_harris Are we overreacting ? He 's in a computer ! What can he do ?
buffy_summers You mean besides convince a perfectly nice kid to try and kill me ? I do n't know . How about mess up all the medical equipment in the world ?
rupert_giles Randomize traffic signals .
buffy_summers Access launch codes for our nuclear missiles .
rupert_giles Destroy the world 's economy .
buffy_summers I think I pretty much capped it with that nuclear missile thing .
rupert_giles Right , yours was best .
xander_harris Okay , he 's a threat , I 'm on board with that now . But what can we do about it ?
buffy_summers I think the first thing we do is find Willow . She 's probably talking to him right now . God , that creeps me out !
xander_harris What does he want with Willow ?
buffy_summers Let 's never find out . Okay , I 'm gon na check the computer lab , and you guys call her home .
buffy_summers Willow ?
xander_harris No answer .
rupert_giles Damn it !
xander_harris Well , it was n't busy either , so she 's not online .
xander_harris She 's not home .
rupert_giles What did you find ?
xander_harris Willow is n't ... .
buffy_summers Dave . He 's dead .
rupert_giles How ?
buffy_summers Well , it looks like suicide .
xander_harris With a little help from my friends ?
buffy_summers I 'd guess Fritz . Or the other zomboids from CRD . Okay , you and I are gon na go to Willow 's house . Giles , you need to come up with a way to get Moloch out of the ' Net .
rupert_giles I , I have records of the ceremonies , but , but that 's for a creature of the flesh . Th - this could be something completely different .
buffy_summers Then get Ms. Calendar . Maybe she can help you .
rupert_giles Well , even if she could , how am I gon na convince her that there 's a demon on the Internet ?
buffy_summers Okay , fine , then you can stay here and come up with a better plan . C'mon .
willow_rosenberg Mom ? Dad ?
PC You have mail .
Message No more waiting . I need you to see me .
PC You have mail .
willow_rosenberg Dad , did you forget your keys again ?
fritz No more waiting .
Radio A spokesman for the archbishop denied the allegations , blaming computer error for the apparent financial discrepancy .
rupert_giles Binding rituals ... .
Radio In Washington D.C. , the FBI today reported that all of its serial killer profiles have been mysteriously downloaded from its central computer .
jenny_calendar Hi . I got your message . What 's so urgent ?

rupert_giles Um , thank you for coming . Uh , I need your help . But before that , um , I need you to believe something that , um , you may not want to . Uh , there 's , uh ... something 's got into the , um ... i - i - inside , um ... There 's a demon in the Internet .
jenny_calendar I know .
buffy_summers Willow ? !
xander_harris This is n't good .
buffy_summers Willow ? !
buffy_summers Willow ? !
xander_harris Okay , any thoughts ?
buffy_summers ' No more waiting , I need you to see me ' ? See him how ? Where ?
xander_harris What about CRD ?
buffy_summers The research place ?
xander_harris I 'm guessing that 's Moloch central .
buffy_summers Guessing that 's our best lead . Let 's just hope Giles can back us up .
rupert_giles You already know ? How exactly is that ?

jenny_calendar Come on , there 've been portents for days . I mean , power surges , online shutdowns ... . You should see the bones I 've been casting . I * knew * this would happen sooner or later . I mean , it 's probably a , a mischief demon , y'know , like Kelkor , or ... .
rupert_giles It 's Moloch .
jenny_calendar The Corrupter ? Oh , boy . I shoulda remembered , I just do n't ... .
rupert_giles Uh ... You do n't seem exactly surprised by ... Who are you ?
jenny_calendar I teach computer science at the local high school .
rupert_giles A profession that hardly lends itself to the casting of bones .

jenny_calendar Wrong and wrong , snobby . You think the realm of the mystical is limited to ancient texts and relics ? That bad old science made the magic go away ? Mm . The divine exists in cyberspace same as out here .
rupert_giles Are you a witch ?
jenny_calendar Mm . I do n't have that kinda power . ' Technopagan ' is the term .
jenny_calendar There are more of us than you think .
rupert_giles Well , uh , you can definitely help me . Um ... What 's in cyberspace at the moment is less than divine .
rupert_giles I have the binding rituals at hand , but I 'm completely out of my idiom .
jenny_calendar Well , I can help ! I think ... I hope , I mean , well , this is my first real ... Do you know how he got in ?
rupert_giles He was , uh , ' scanned ' is the term , I believe .
jenny_calendar And you want him back in the book ?
rupert_giles Buffy !
buffy_summers Yeah .
rupert_giles Willow ?
buffy_summers Not at home . It looks like she was taken somewhere .
rupert_giles Where are you ?
buffy_summers CRD . Whatever Moloch wants Willow for , it 's probably in there .
rupert_giles Ms. Calendar and I are , uh , working to get Moloch offline .
buffy_summers Here 's a tip : hurry !
Moloch Welcome , my love .
Moloch I ca n't tell you how good it is to see you ... .
Moloch ... with my own two eyes .
Moloch Willow .
willow_rosenberg Malcolm .

Moloch This world is so new , so exciting . I can see all of it . Everything flows through me . I know the secrets of your kings . But nothing compares to having form again . To be able to walk , to touch , to kill .
xander_harris Back way ?
buffy_summers Back way .
Moloch Here they come .
jenny_calendar The first thing we have to do is form the circle of Kayless . Right ?
rupert_giles Form a circle ? But there 's only two of us . That 's really more of a line .
jenny_calendar You 're not getting it , Rupert . We have to form the circle inside . I 'm putting out a flash . I just hope enough of my group responds .
rupert_giles Wo n't Moloch just shut you down ?
jenny_calendar Well , I 'm betting he wo n't figure out what we 're doing until it 's too late .
rupert_giles Hoping and betting , that 's what we 've got .
jenny_calendar You wanna throw in praying ? Be my guest .
willow_rosenberg I do n't understand . What do you want from me ?
